definition: a support for the genitals worn by men engaging in strenuous exercise
details:
noun
- a support for the genitals worn by men engaging in strenuous exercise
= synonyms: suspensor, jockstrap, jock, athletic supporter
- a band (usually elastic) worn around the leg to hold up a stocking (or around the arm to hold up a sleeve)
= synonyms: garter
- a person who contributes to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose
= synonyms: assistant
- someone who supports or champions something
= synonyms: patron, sponsor
- a person who backs a politician or a team etc.
= example: a person who backs a politician or a team etc.
= synonyms: champion
